meanings.definition: Crumbiest: superlative form of crumby, meaning covered in or containing crumbs
meanings.sent1: The cookie was the crumbiest treat I had ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The crumbiest part of the cake was the delicious crumb topping.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally sat on the crumbiest chair in the room, and now I have crumbs all over me!
meanings.sent4: The crumbiest path through the forest was a trail of fallen leaves and broken twigs.
meanings.sent5: The crumbiest picnic blanket was covered in a colorful array of crumbs from various snacks.

meanings.definition: Crumbiest: superlative form of crumby, meaning of poor quality or unpleasant
meanings.sent1: The crumbiest movie I watched last night was so boring.
meanings.sent2: The crumbiest part of the day was when it started raining during the picnic.
meanings.sent3: I tried to fix the crumbiest toy, but it kept falling apart in my hands.
meanings.sent4: The crumbiest gift I ever received was a broken clock that couldn't be fixed.
meanings.sent5: The crumbiest restaurant in town had terrible service and cold food.

meanings.definition: Crumbiest: superlative form of crumby, meaning easily broken into small pieces
meanings.sent1: The crumbiest cookie crumbled as soon as I picked it up.
meanings.sent2: The crumbiest bread was so delicate that it fell apart with a gentle touch.
meanings.sent3: I tried to build a sandcastle, but the crumbiest sand kept slipping through my fingers.
meanings.sent4: The crumbiest ice cream cone shattered into pieces when it hit the ground.
meanings.sent5: The crumbiest pottery was so fragile that it broke with the lightest tap.
